# LinearPCMFormatFlagIsNonInterleaved

**Enumeration Case**

A flag to indicate whether PCM channels interleave their samples in the data.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCMFormatFlagIsNonInterleaved
```

## Discussion

This flag is a synonym of [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsNonInterleaved].

## Channel Layout Flags

- **FormatFlagIsNonInterleaved**: A flag to indicate whether the channels interleave their samples in the data.
